title: Deploy Disintegrate DeFi Protocol to Production

requirements.summary: Deploy the current application version to the Internet Computer mainnet for production use
acceptanceCriteria: Application is accessible via a production Internet Computer canister URL
All backend functionality (burn tracking, token claiming, balance queries) works on mainnet
Frontend connects to the production backend canister
Internet Identity authentication works in production environment

file_operations.description: Update the Internet Identity provider configuration to use the production Internet Identity canister URL for mainnet deployment. Verify that the AuthClient initialization uses the correct production endpoints.
Ensure the actor creation uses the production backend canister ID and mainnet host URL. Update the agent configuration to connect to the mainnet IC network instead of local replica.
Update meta tags and configuration for production deployment, ensuring proper asset references and canonical URLs for the mainnet environment.
